directions: Whisk yogurt, mayonnaise, vinegar, onion, sugar, and celery seeds in large bowl to blend. Add green and red cabbage, bell pepper, carrots, and 1 tablespoon dill. Toss to blend. Season salad to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate 1 hour. (Can be made 2 hours ahead. Keep refrigerated. Toss to blend before using.) Sprinkle salad with remaining 1 tablespoon dill and serve.
ingredients: 1/2 large green bell pepper, thinly sliced into strips
title: Two-Tone Coleslaw with Celery-Seed Yogurt Dressing
